Keyboard shortcuts for Spotify

A visual cheat-sheet for the 23 keyboard shortcuts found in Spotify

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Create new playlist

  • Ctrl
  • N

Cut

  • Ctrl
  • X

Copy

  • Ctrl
  • C

Copy (alternative link)

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • C

Paste

  • Ctrl
  • V

Delete

  • Del

Select all

  • Ctrl
  • A

Play/pause

  • Space

Next track

  • Ctrl
  • Right

Previous track

  • Ctrl
  • Left

Volume up

  • Ctrl
  • Up

Volume down

  • Ctrl
  • Down

Mute

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Down

Max volume

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Up

Show help

  • F1

Filter (in Songs and Playlists)

  • Ctrl
  • F

Give focus to search field

  • Ctrl
  • L

Go back

  • Alt
  • Left

Go forward

  • Alt
  • Right

Play selected row

  • Enter

Preferences

  • Ctrl
  • P

Logout active user

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • W

Quit

  • Alt
  • F4
